duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform general maintenance tasks including plumbing, electrical, HVAC repair, painting, drywall repair, and pressure washing.
Maintain recreational amenities and conduct routine inspections.
Complete preventative maintenance tasks and maintain pool features and Ph levels.
Complete grounds work to keep the community safe, clean, and free of debris.
Maintain tools and equipment, complete maintenance reports, documentation, and respond to emergencies as needed.

education_certification.credential: 2 years HOA residential maintenance or equivalent, property or high-rise management or equivalent, and excellent handyman skills
